editor.label: Resource - @PLUGIN_KEY@ Relocate
editor.description: Relocate a virtual machine to the specified destination host. Relocate operation is ONLY supported and ONLY works when connecting against vCenter Server and not individual ESX(i) host.

formElement.label: ESX Connection:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.

formElement.label: VM Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the virtual machine to be relocated.

formElement.label: Datastore:
formElement.documentation: Name of the datastore. Default: Datastore with the most free space.

formElement.label: Destination Host:
formElement.documentation: Target host for the virtual machine.

formElement.label: Number of VMs:
formElement.documentation: Number of virtual machines to relocate (default is 1). If the value is greater than 1, a suffix is added to VM names. The suffix consists of an underscore and the VM number ('_#').

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
